LanguageData.FC_HemoWeapons_UseChargesDesc: Use blood charges to significantly power up attacks.\nNote that the weapon will recover blood charges on kill. If it runs out sooner, there are other sources of blood around a battlefield...
LanguageData.FC_HemoWeapons_UseBloodDesc: Have the weapon injure the wielder to acquire the hemogenic power it needs
LanguageData.FC_HemoWeapons_UseHemogenDesc: Have the weapon use the wielder's own hemogen to power itself
LanguageData.FC_HemoWeapons_HemoDrainDesc: Use on a downed pawn to consume all of their remaining life-blood to restore all blood charges.
